fractionalPart.description: Returns a string representing the fractional part of this decimal number.

nonZeroFractionalPart.description: Returns whether this decimal number has a non-zero fractional part.

zero.description: Checks if this number equals zero.

positive.description: Checks if this number is strictly positive.
